oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kansas City and Memphis Railway Bridge
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Kansas City and Memphis Railway Bridge, Memphis, Tenn. Don’t this look good to you?” Color image.

“Miss Irene Brignardello -- Memphis -- Tenn -- 1556 Court -- Hello Sis. -- How are you & -- Miss Katie. We are -- all well now as Papa -- is out again this -- morning. The “kids” -- are fine & send their -- love -- Yours Ed.”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Harahan Bridge; bridges; Mississippi River; rivers; railroads;
